title: PATRIOTS: Will you VOTE and WHY?
itunes:title: PATRIOTS: Will you VOTE and WHY?
description: We want to hear from you as the U.S. rapidly approaches the Midterm Elections. Will you be casting your ballot? And what policy issues do you believe are essential to bringing prosperity and peace back to the U.S. and the world? Jay, Jordan, and the Sekulow team give their perspectives and take your calls. This and more today on Sekulow.
content:encoded: We want to hear from you as the U.S. rapidly approaches the Midterm Elections. Will you be casting your ballot?
